name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harry ZMENKOWSKI a/k/a Richard Zmenkowski, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ. •
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harry ZMENKOWSKI a/k/a Richard Zmenkowski, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5th day of May, 1999, the above-captioned matter is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Vincent C. Murovieh, Pittsburgh, for Harry Zmenkowski.
Claire C. Capristo, Michael W. Streily, Pittsburgh, Kevin F. McCarthy, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
727 A.2d 569
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Harry ZMENKOWSKI a/k/a Richard Zmenkowski, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 18, 1998.
Decided May 5, 1999.
Vincent C. Murovieh, Pittsburgh, for Harry Zmenkowski.
Claire C. Capristo, Michael W. Streily, Pittsburgh, Kevin F. McCarthy, Philadelphia, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ. •
